titles.title: Community Development Act of 1995
To provide for the return of economic resources for the imposition of certain customs fees and duties to the community in which the customs fees and duties are collected.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 8/4/1995--Introduced. Community Development Act of 1995 - Amends Federal customs law to require the Secretary of the Treasury to promulgate regulations providing for the return of one percent of customs duties assessed on a commodity to the port or airport of entry that is a public corporation in which the commodity was located at the time of assessment.
